resources.string:
"Ikhulisa okuqukethwe okusesikrinini."

"Chofoza isithonjana sesikhulisi ukuze ukhanyise okwesikhashana isikhulisi. Uma uthinta isikrini, isikhulisi sizolandela umunwe wakho. Ukuze ushintshe ileveli yokusondeza, beka umunwe wesibili esikrinini bese uhudulele eduzane noma kude komunye umunwe wakho. Yeka ukuthinta isikrini ukuze ushiye ukukhulisa."

"Cindezela futhi ubambe isithonjana sesikhulisi ukuze ushintshe indawo yesithonjana esikrinini."

"Ukuze ushintshe ukwahlukana nokukhanya phakathi kokukhulisa, bona ikhasi lezilungiselelo."
"Uxolo, idivayisi yakho okwamanje ayisekeli isilondolozi-sikrini."\n\n"Sicela ukhubaze isevisi."
